title: international economics ii: international monetary theory and open-economy macroeconomics
content: this second volume covers all the conventional topics of international monetary theory and open-economy macroeconomics, and a lot more besides. gandolfo treats such further concepts as the theory of monetary integration and the european monetary union, foreign exchange crises and the tobin tax, theory of games and international policy coordination.it follows the "two-tier" structure of the first volume, and, thanks to its self-contained treatment, may equally be used as a reference book.
